# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I understand its worth to you is $12,000. I am offering this remarkable opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $11,000. This is an exclusive offer tailored to recognize your discerning taste and commitment to excellence. Don't miss out on this chance to elevate your business or personal endeavors with this top-tier solution. If you're interested, please let me know, and we can proceed with the transaction. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $11,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $11,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
